name: Walk Man's Quest For Power
description:
Grab some cassettes and jump into the action!

You play as the titular Walk Man with a magical cassette player. Using the cassettes' various power, you must help the citizens of Puerto Rico before the storm hits!

Note: Due to many time constraints and constant power outages during the jam process, this game is both unpolished and unfinished. It does contains the basic gameplay mechanics that we planned out, but we wanted to tell a story that deals with natural disasters and ironically the power grid troubles in Puerto Rico.

Keyboard and Mouse Controls 
  • W Button - Jump.
  • A and D Buttons - Move left and right.
  • Arrow Keys - Cycle between different cassette powers.
  • Left Shift - Activate Dash Power.
  • Left Click - Interact to destroy obstacles or generate power.
Credits

  • Bryan B. Bonilla Díaz - "The Music Guy"
  • Orlando Santiago - Programmer / Pixel Animation Rigger

  • Sergio Acevedo - Project Manager / Key Illustration Artist
